text: Sturgeon is a city in Boone County, Missouri, United States. ==History== Sturgeon was platted in 1856 next to Prairie City. It was incorporated in 1859. It was rechartered in 1875. It was named for Isaac H. Sturgeon. He was the superintendent of the North Missouri Railroad at the time. ==References== Category:Cities in Missouri Category:Settlements in Boone County, Missouri
title: Sturgeon, Missouri
